A training organisation set up to deliver quality training and assessments to corporate organisations and individuals. We believe in making a difference in our clients by offering bespoke training packages, bringing innovation and creativity to the business, whilst recognising talents and maximising potential in individuals. Our goal is your success and development through our services.At Excelsis we are committed to making a difference in your world of performance, productivity and customer satisfaction.

Excelsis Training is committed to the Transformation of organisations, community and individual. We are a Change agent with the heart to inspire to exceed; Motivate to Excel; Develop to Expand, both Organisation and Individual.

With a combine experience of over 20 years, we offer a range of training programmes to suit your client’s needs. Each course is a combination of innovative training, personal development and work experience tailored to individual circumstances. We invest time and resources in getting to know the clients, making sure they get the right skills and abilities to fit in perfectly with prospective employer needs. We equip clients through a range of supportive activities.

At Excelsis we believe in delivering chosen or imposed training that will have a positive impact on the company. All our training are result based and these results become very visible in a short period of time. How do we do this? We pride ourselves in accurate diagnostic and profiling of clients/delegates which enables us to develop a comprehensive Training Needs Analysis, which then leads to the design of the bespoke training.

Excelsis Training Limited offer a range of tailored training programmes to suit your needs. Each training course is a combination of innovative delivery and personal development tailored to individual circumstances. We invest time and resources in getting to know the delegates, making sure they get the right skills and abilities to fit in perfectly with their organization’s needs and cultures. We equip our clients through a range of supportive activities, which include training, coaching and mentoring.

name.en-US: Functional Skills:- Maths and English from E3 to GCSE level
Vocational Skills:- Business Admin, Customer Service, ITQ/ICT, Employability

description.en-US: The performance management training course equips delegates with the skills and techniques to ensure staff perform to the peak of their abilities. It covers dealing with the 'Star', the 'Plodder', the 'Peaked' and the 'Poor Performer'.

name.en-US: Diversity and Cross Culture awareness Training

description.en-US: This intensive one day Managing Diversity training course will explore the issues surrounding diversity in the workplace, the legislation that exists and the benefits that a diverse workforce can bring to your organization

This Coaching & Mentoring training course focuses on the methods by which managers develop the performance of individuals in their team. It looks at two main types of coaching, providing opportunities for managers to apply these skills.
This practical two day Recruitment & Selection training course will provide individuals with guidance in the skills and techniques essential to conducting successful selection interviews.

This Train the IT Trainer course is designed to assist I.T. Trainers to understand and implement the skills required to provide high quality training. During this Train the Trainer course you will be investigating ways in which to make I.T. courses more enjoyable and memorable for both the delegate and the trainer.
This staff motivation training course is designed to help managers develop their motivational techniques, by understanding what is required, what works and then implementing a personal action plan.
This Absence Management course achieves its aim through a variety of techniques: facilitated discussion, group exercises & role play.

- Negotiation Training:- Get more for less, after this training you will understand how to. 

- Management Training:- Managing your staff persistently effectively

- Leadership Development Training:- Leadership is a skill above management learn how to.

- Appraisals Training:- Increase the effectiveness of your staff by measurement

- Human Resources Training:- Learn how to generate and keep records, and write policies.

- Performance Management Training:- Learn how to effectively performance manage

- Training Needs Analysis Training:- How to know your organizational training needs.

- Coaching & Mentoring Training:- Raising effective mentors, coaches & improve productivity.

- Recruitment & Selection training course:- Getting Recruitment right the first time!

- Train the IT Trainer:- Training and develop your trainers with tools they can’t do without.

- Writing Courseware Material training:- Develop your effective and impactful writing skills.

- Absence Management course:- Reduce absenteeism by 40% in 6 months, learn how.

- Staff motivation training course:- Increase staff Motivation and self awareness / confidence.

- Organizational Communication Training:- Communicate effectively in and out of your organisation.

en-US: Specific IT Training:-	High spec niche IT programmes are available here.
Project Management (PRINCE2):- Certified (after sitting an Exam for it)
Time Management Training:- Doing More in Less time (maximizing your day)

description.en-US: An interview is a life-changing experience for both interviewees and interviewers! This Interviewing Techniques training course helps you to ensure that you get good people to help take your organisation's image, style, and efficiency further forward. It can be expensive to recruit new members of your team; and even more expensive if you recruit the wrong people!
